title: Episode 9 w/ Too $hort
itunes:title: Episode 9 w/ Too $hort
description:
N.O.R.E. and DJ EFN present the Drink Champs. In this episode the guys drink it up with West Coast pioneer, Too $hort. They discuss Too $horts Los Angeles roots, then his Bay Area beginnings, pimp culture, staying relevant all these years and a lot more. --- Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/drinkchamps/support

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
